===========================
Skailar 3.1.11 release notes
===========================

*May 13, 2021*

Skailar 3.1.11 fixes a regression in 3.1.9.

Bugfixes
========

* Fixed a regression in Skailar 3.1.9 where saving ``FileField`` would raise a
  ``SuspiciousFileOperation`` even when a custom
  :attr:`~skailar.db.models.FileField.upload_to` returns a valid file path
  (:ticket:`32718`).
